titles.title: Electing Minority Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/10/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects named Minority Members to the House Committees on Armed Services and on Foreign Affairs.
